Author: daemonfox#6136
Content: launch a fresh daemon but instead of normal command, add a specific addnode=5.9.102.210 which is James main full node, then also add the nSPV=1 flag

Author: daemonfox#6136
Content: ./komodod -ac_name=ILN -ac_supply=10000000000 -ac_cc=2 -addnode=5.9.102.210 -nSPV=1

Author: daemonfox#6136
Content: ./komodo-cli -ac_name=ILN nspv_getinfo
